images.caption: woman with long wavy black hair parted at the center, light yellow background, bare shoulders and visible upper chest, narrow neck, large almond-shaped eyes with dark eyeliner, slightly arched eyebrows, thin nose, full lips puckered outward, and a subtle hint of blush; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration

woman wearing a gold knee-length dress with delicate fabric texture, bright blue background, medium-length wavy blonde hair with a slightly off-center part, closed eyes drawn as smooth curved lines with prominent eyelashes, a wide open-mouth smile showing upper teeth, chin pushed forward by a broad, engaging smile, thin upper lips, arms extended with elbows gently bent, fingers splayed naturally with a visible ring on the right hand, and a graceful neck elongation; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.

man in a plaid suit jacket combining shades of brown and gray over a crisp white shirt and blue tie, set against a subtle blue gradient background; his medium-length neatly styled black hair, heavy dark eyebrows, and half-lidded eyes looking to the side accompany a faint, knowing smirk, prominent cheekbones, and a slightly tilted head; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.

man with short, layered light brown hair wearing rectangular black-rimmed glasses and a dark teal turtleneck sweater against a bold red background; his elongated vertical face, partially closed eyes behind glasses, open mouth with curled upper lip and stretched lower lip revealing visible teeth, and an elongated chin give him a distinctive look; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.

woman with short dark brown hair styled with a soft side part, wearing a sleeveless white dress with a low neckline that reveals her graceful collarbones, holding a sleek black cigarette holder from which wisps of smoke trail upward, set against a vivid red background; her large round eyes accented with black eyeliner, thick eyebrows, thin nose, and slightly pouty lips are complemented by subtle pearl earrings and a delicate beaded bracelet on her left wrist; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.

two men posing in a comedic stance on a clean white background; the left man has blonde hair with defined sideburns, wearing a teal blazer embossed with a crest, a white shirt, dark tie, and light gray trousers, grinning widely with visible upper teeth, his arms bent at the elbows and hands resting near his waist; the right man dons a dark navy suit with matching trousers, a crisp white shirt, a black tie, and a classic bowler hat, holding a brown briefcase in his right hand while his left leg is raised as if caught mid-step, his facial expression stern with half-closed eyes and an elongated nose; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.

man dressed in a brown suit jacket with matching trousers over a white shirt and a red polka-dot tie, set against a bright yellow background; his short black hair, arched eyebrows, elongated nose, and a wide grin exposing his upper teeth are accentuated by his playful gesture as he holds a small brown teddy bear in his left hand while pointing at it with his right index finger; rendered in a caricature style with exaggerated facial features, cartoon, digital illustration.
